oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Evaluation of a Commercial Vaccine to Protect Developing Fetuses from Natural Challenges with Bovine Viral Diarrhea Virus and Bovine Herpesvirus 1
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Givens, M. D.
Marley, M. S. D.
Jones, C. A.
Ensley, D.
Joiner, K. S.
Rodning, S. P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fetal protection
modified-live vaccine
persistently infected
BVDV
bovine herpesvirus 1
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Fetal protection in heifers vaccinated with a modified-live vaccine (ExpressÂ® FPS, Boehringer Ingelheim Vetmedica) was evaluated following sequential, prolonged field exposures to animals persistently infected (PI) with bovine viral diarrhea virus (BVDV) and animals acutely infected with bovine herpesvirus 1 (BoHV-1).
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2010; 249
